channel.title: Ponmaalai Music Kahoot — Demographic Insights (Top 5)
channel.description: Visual-first insights; no nicknames, only demographic trends with totals and deltas annotated in the images.

item.title: Top 5 Combos: Generation × Current City
item.description: Fun fact: Generation X is often nicknamed the “Latchkey Generation,” reflecting their early independence.

item.title: Top Generations by Total Points
item.description: Fun fact: Generation X is typically defined as people born from 1965 to 1980.

item.title: Top Cities by Total Points
item.description: Fun fact: Kirkland was the original home of the Seattle Seahawks’ headquarters and training facility (through 2007).

item.title: Generational Momentum: Round 7 vs Projected Round 8
item.description: Fun fact: Generation X sits between the Baby Boomers and Millennials and numbered about 65 million in the U.S. in 2019.

item.title: Rising Cities: Momentum (Rounds 5–7 minus 1–3)
item.description: Fun fact: Everett hosts Boeing’s Everett Factory, the world’s largest building by volume.
